00048 vector<EGS_Library *> rc_libs;
00049 static int n_run_controls = 0;
00050 
00051 EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl(EGS_Application *a) : app(a), input(0),
00052     ncase(0), ndone(0), nbatch(10), maxt(-1), accu(-1), restart(0), nchunk(1),
00053     cpu_time(0), previous_cpu_time(0), geomErrorCount(0), geomErrorMax(0) {
00054     n_run_controls++;
00055     if (!app) egsFatal("EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl: it is not allowed\n"
00056                            " to construct a run control object on a NULL application\n");
00057     input = app->getInput();
00058     if (!input) {
00059         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl: the application has no"
00060                    " input\n");
00061         return;
00062     }
00063     input = input->takeInputItem("run control");
00064     if (!input) {
00065         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl: no 'run control' "
00066                    "input\n");
00067         return;
00068     }
00069     double ncase_double;
00070     int err = input->getInput("number of histories", ncase_double);
00071     if (err) {
00072         err = input->getInput("ncase", ncase_double);
00073         if (err)
00074             egsWarning("EGS_RunControl: missing/wrong 'ncase' or "
00075                        "'number of histories' input\n");
00076     }
00077     ncase = EGS_I64(ncase_double);
00078     err = input->getInput("nbatch",nbatch);
00079     if (err) {
00080         nbatch = 10;
00081     }
00082     err = input->getInput("max cpu hours allowed",maxt);
00083     if (err) {
00084         maxt = -1;
00085     }
00086     err = input->getInput("statistical accuracy sought",accu);
00087     if (err) {
00088         accu = -1;
00089     }
00090     err = input->getInput("geometry error limit", geomErrorMax);
00091     if (err) {
00092         geomErrorMax = 0;
00093     }
00094     vector<string> ctype;
00095     ctype.push_back("first");
00096     ctype.push_back("restart");
00097     ctype.push_back("analyze");
00098     ctype.push_back("combine");
00099     restart = input->getInput("calculation",ctype,0);
00100 }
00101 
00102 EGS_RunControl::~EGS_RunControl() {
00103     if (input) {
00104         delete input;
00105     }
00106     n_run_controls--;
00107     if (!n_run_controls) {
00108         while (rc_libs.size() > 0) {
00109             delete rc_libs[rc_libs.size()-1];
00110             rc_libs.pop_back();
00111         }
00112     }
00113 }

00115 bool EGS_RunControl::storeState(ostream &data) {
00116     if (!egsStoreI64(data,ndone)) {
00117         return false;
00118     }
00119     data << "  " << (cpu_time+previous_cpu_time) << endl;
00120     return data.good();
00121 }
00122 
00123 bool EGS_RunControl::setState(istream &data) {
00124     EGS_I64 ndone1;
00125     if (!egsGetI64(data,ndone1)) {
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128     ndone += ndone1;
00129     ncase += ndone1;
00130     data >> previous_cpu_time;
00131     return data.good();
00132 }
00133 
00134 bool EGS_RunControl::addState(istream &data) {
00135     EGS_Float previous_cpu_time_save = previous_cpu_time;
00136     if (!setState(data)) {
00137         return false;
00138     }
00139     previous_cpu_time += previous_cpu_time_save;
00140     return true;
00141 }
00142 
00143 void EGS_RunControl::resetCounter() {
00144     previous_cpu_time = 0;
00145     cpu_time = 0;
00146     timer.start();
00147     ncase = 0;
00148     ndone = 0;
00149 }
00150 
00151 int EGS_RunControl::startSimulation() {
00152     if (restart == 1 || restart == 2) {
00153         if (app->readData()) {
00154             return -1;
00155         }
00156         if (restart == 2) {
00157             ncase = ndone;
00158             egsInformation("\n\nResult analysis only\n\n");
00159             return 1;
00160         }
00161     }
00162     else if (restart == 3) {
00163         app->describeSimulation();
00164         egsInformation("\n\nCombine results only\n\n");
00165         egsInformation("calling combineResults()\n");
00166         int err = app->combineResults();
00167         ncase = ndone;
00168         return err ? -1 : 2;
00169     }
00170     app->describeSimulation();
00171     time_t tinfo = time(0);
00172     egsInformation("\n\nStarting simulation on %s\n",
00173                    asctime(localtime(&tinfo)));
00174     if (restart == 0) {
00175         egsInformation("    Fresh simulation of %lld histories\n\n\n",ncase);
00176     }
00177     else {
00178         egsInformation("    Restarted simulation with %lld old and %lld"
00179                        " new histories\n\n\n",ndone,ncase-ndone);
00180     }
00181     timer.start();
00182     return 0;
00183 }
00184 
00185 bool EGS_RunControl::startBatch(int ibatch, EGS_I64 ncase_per_batch) {
00186     if (!ibatch) egsInformation(
00187             "  Batch             CPU time        Result   Uncertainty(%c)\n"
00188             "==========================================================\n",'%');
00189     if (maxt > 0 && ndone > 0) {
00190         EGS_Float time_per_shower = (cpu_time + previous_cpu_time)/ndone;
00191         EGS_Float extra_time = time_per_shower*ncase_per_batch;
00192         if (cpu_time + extra_time > maxt*3600) {
00193             egsWarning("\n\n*** Not enough time to finish another batch\n"
00194                        "    => terminating simulation.\n\n");
00195             return false;
00196         }
00197     }
00198     egsInformation("%7d",ibatch+1);
00199     ndone += ncase_per_batch;
00200     return true;
00201 }
00202 
00203 bool EGS_RunControl::finishBatch() {
00204     cpu_time = timer.time();
00205     int out = app->outputData();
00206     if (out) {
00207         egsWarning("\n\noutputData() returned error code %d ?\n",out);
00208     }
00209     double sum, sum2, norm, count;
00210     app->getCurrentResult(sum,sum2,norm,count);
00211     double f, df;
00212     if (sum > 0 && sum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && count > 1) {
00213         f = sum*norm/count;
00214         df = count*sum2/(sum*sum)-1;
00215         if (df > 0) {
00216             df = 100*sqrt(df/(count-1));
00217         }
00218         else {
00219             df = 100;
00220         }
00221     }
00222     else {
00223         f = 0;
00224         df = 100;
00225     }
00226     egsInformation("        %12.2f %14g %14.2f\n",cpu_time,f,df);
00227     if (df < 100 && accu > 0 && df < accu) {
00228         char c = '%';
00229         egsWarning("\n\n*** Reached the requested uncertainty of %g%c\n"
00230                    "    => terminating simulation.\n\n",accu,c);
00231         return false;
00232     }
00233     return true;
00234 }

00245     #define OPEN_FILE _open
00246     #define CLOSE_FILE _close
00247     #define CREATE_FLAGS _O_CREAT | _O_EXCL | _O_RDWR, _S_IREAD | _S_IWRITE
00248     #define OPEN_FLAGS _O_RDWR,_S_IREAD | _S_IWRITE
00249     #define WAIT_FOR_FILE _sleep(1000)
00250     #define WRITE_FILE _write
00251     #define READ_FILE _read
00252

00256     #include <fcntl.h>

00258     #include <sys/stat.h>
00259     #include <errno.h>
00260     #include <string.h>
00261     #include <stdio.h>
00262 
00263     #define OPEN_FILE open
00264     #define CLOSE_FILE close
00265     #define CREATE_FLAGS O_RDWR | O_CREAT | O_EXCL, S_IRUSR | S_IWUSR
00266     #define OPEN_FLAGS O_RDWR
00267     #define WAIT_FOR_FILE sleep(1)
00268     #define WRITE_FILE write
00269     #define READ_FILE read

00273 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00274 
00279 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_FileLocking {
00280 public:
00281     int  fd;
00282     bool is_locked;
00283     int  ntry;
00284 #ifndef WIN32
00285     struct flock fl_write, fl_unlock;
00286 #endif
00287     EGS_FileLocking() : fd(-1), is_locked(false), ntry(15) {
00288 #ifndef WIN32
00289         fl_write.l_type = F_WRLCK;
00290         fl_write.l_whence = SEEK_SET;
00291         fl_write.l_start = 0;
00292         fl_write.l_len = 0;
00293         fl_unlock.l_type = F_UNLCK;
00294         fl_unlock.l_whence = SEEK_SET;
00295         fl_unlock.l_start = 0;
00296         fl_unlock.l_len = 0;
00297 #endif
00298     };
00299     ~EGS_FileLocking() {
00300         if (fd > 0) {
00301             CLOSE_FILE(fd);
00302         }
00303     };
00304     bool createControlFile(const char *fname) {
00305         is_locked = false;
00306         if (fd > 0) {
00307             CLOSE_FILE(fd);
00308         }
00309         fd = OPEN_FILE(fname,CREATE_FLAGS);
00310         egsWarning("createControlFile: file=%s fd=%d\n",fname,fd);
00311         if (fd < 0) {
00312             egsWarning("createControlFile(): open failed! (fd=%d)\n",fd);
00313 #ifndef WIN32
00314             perror("System error was");
00315 #endif
00316         }
00317         return lockControlFile();
00318     };
00319     bool openControlFile(const char *fname) {
00320         is_locked = false;
00321         if (fd > 0) {
00322             CLOSE_FILE(fd);
00323         }
00324         for (int t=0; t<ntry; t++) {
00325             fd = OPEN_FILE(fname,OPEN_FLAGS);
00326             if (fd > 0) {
00327                 break;
00328             }
00329             WAIT_FOR_FILE;
00330         }
00331         return (fd > 0);
00332     };
00333     bool closeControlFile() {
00334         if (fd > 0) {
00335             int res = CLOSE_FILE(fd);
00336             fd = -1;
00337             return !res;
00338         }
00339         return true;
00340     };
00341     bool lockControlFile() {
00342         if (is_locked) {
00343             return true;
00344         }
00345         if (fd < 0) {
00346             return false;
00347         }
00348 #ifdef WIN32
00349         long np = _lseek(fd,0L,SEEK_SET);
00350         if (np) {
00351             egsWarning("lockControlFile: _lseek returned %d?\n",np);
00352             return false;
00353         }
00354         int res = _locking(fd,_LK_LOCK,1000000L);
00355         if (!res) {
00356             is_locked = true;
00357             return true;
00358         }
00359         return false;
00360 #else
00361         for (int i1=0; i1<5; i1++) {
00362             for (int i2=0; i2<12; i2++) {
00363                 int res = fcntl(fd,F_SETLK,&fl_write);
00364                 if (!res) {
00365                     is_locked = true;
00366                     return true;
00367                 }
00368                 WAIT_FOR_FILE ;
00369             }
00370             egsWarning("lockControlFile: failed to lock file for "
00371                        "12 seconds...\n");
00372         }
00373         return false;
00374 #endif
00375     };
00376     bool unlockControlFile() {
00377         if (!is_locked) {
00378             return true;
00379         }
00380         if (fd < 0) {
00381             return false;
00382         }
00383 #ifdef WIN32
00384         int np = _lseek(fd,0L,SEEK_SET);
00385         if (np) {
00386             egsWarning("unlockControlFile: _lseek returned %d?\n",np);
00387             return false;
00388         }
00389         int res = _locking(fd,_LK_UNLCK,1000000L);
00390 #else
00391         int res = fcntl(fd,F_SETLKW,&fl_unlock);
00392 #endif
00393         if (!res) {
00394             is_locked = false;
00395             return true;
00396         }
00397         return false;
00398     };
00399     bool rewindControlFile() {
00400         if (fd < 0) {
00401             return false;
00402         }
00403         if (!is_locked) {
00404             if (!lockControlFile()) {
00405                 return false;
00406             }
00407         }
00408 #ifdef WIN32
00409         return !_lseek(fd,0,SEEK_SET);
00410 #else
00411         return !lseek(fd,0,SEEK_SET);
00412 #endif
00413     };
00414 };
00415 
00416 #endif

00418 EGS_JCFControl::EGS_JCFControl(EGS_Application *a, int Nbuf) :
00419     EGS_RunControl(a), p(new EGS_FileLocking),
00420     npar(app->getNparallel()), ipar(app->getIparallel()),
00421     first_time(true), nbuf(Nbuf), njob(0), tsum(0), tsum2(0), tcount(0),
00422     norm(1), last_sum(0), last_sum2(0), last_count(0), removed_jcf(false) {
00423     if (input) {
00424         int err = input->getInput("nchunk",nchunk);
00425         if (err) {
00426             nchunk = 10;
00427         }
00428     }
00429     else {
00430         nchunk = 10;
00431     }
00432     if (nbuf < 0) {
00433         nbuf = 1024;
00434     }
00435     buf = new char [nbuf];
00436     nleft = ncase;
00437     ntot = 0;
00438     //egsInformation("EGS_JCFControl::EGS_JCFControl:\n");
00439     //egsInformation("  ncase = %lld nleft = %lld nchunk = %d\n",
00440     //        nleft,ncase,nchunk);
00441 }
00442 
00443 bool EGS_JCFControl::createControlFile() {
00444     string cfile = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),app->getFinalOutputFile());
00445     cfile += ".lock";
00446     if (!p->createControlFile(cfile.c_str())) {
00447         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to create or lock the "
00448                    " job control file %s\n\n",cfile.c_str());
00449         return false;
00450     }
00451     if (p->fd < 0) {
00452         return false;
00453     }
00454     writeControlString();
00455     int nwant = strlen(buf)+1;
00456     int nwrite = WRITE_FILE(p->fd,buf,nwant);
00457     if (nwrite != nwant) {
00458         return false;
00459     }
00460     return p->unlockControlFile();
00461 }
00462 
00463 bool EGS_JCFControl::openControlFile() {
00464     string cfile = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),app->getFinalOutputFile());
00465     cfile += ".lock";
00466     if (!p->openControlFile(cfile.c_str())) {
00467         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to open the "
00468                    " job control file %s\n\n",cfile.c_str());
00469         return false;
00470     }
00471     return true;
00472 }

00475     #include <strstream>

00477     #define MY_ISTREAM std::istrstream

00479     #include <sstream>

00481     #define MY_ISTREAM std::istringstream

00484 bool EGS_JCFControl::writeControlString() {
00485     //if( first_time ) { start_time = time(0); first_time = false; }
00486     if (first_time) {
00487         start_time = time(0);
00488     }
00489     /*
00490     MY_OSTREAM data(buf);
00491     //ostream &data = cout;
00492     if( !egsStoreI64(data,ntot) ) return false;
00493     if( !egsStoreI64(data,nleft) ) return false;
00494     data << " " << njob << " " << tsum << " " << tsum2 << " " << tcount << " ";
00495     double f = tsum*norm, df;
00496     if( tsum > 0 && tsum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && tcount > 1 ) {
00497         df = tcount*tsum2/(tsum*tsum)-1;
00498         if( df > 0 ) df = 100*sqrt(df/(tcount-1)); else df = 100;
00499     } else df = 100;
00500     data << f << " " << df << " " << start_time << endl;
00501     if( f > 0 && df < 100 ) egsInformation("\nCombined result from all "
00502           "parallel jobs: %g +/- %g%%\n\n",f,df);
00503     egsInformation("EGS_JCFControl::writeControlString: <%s>\n",buf);
00504     return data.good();
00505     */
00506     double f = tsum*norm, df;
00507     if (tsum > 0 && tsum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && tcount > 1) {
00508         f = tsum*norm/tcount;
00509         df = tcount*tsum2/(tsum*tsum)-1;
00510         if (df > 0) {
00511             df = 100*sqrt(df/(tcount-1));
00512         }
00513         else {
00514             df = 100;
00515         }
00516     }
00517     else {
00518         df = 100;
00519     }
00520     sprintf(buf,"%lld %lld %d %lg %lg %lg %lg %lg %ld ",ntot,nleft,njob,tsum,
00521             tsum2,tcount,f,df,start_time);
00522     return true;
00523 }
00524 
00525 bool EGS_JCFControl::getCombinedResult(double &f, double &df) const {
00526     if (tsum > 0 && tsum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && tcount > 1) {
00527         f = tsum*norm/tcount;
00528         df = tcount*tsum2/(tsum*tsum)-1;
00529         if (df > 0) {
00530             df = 100*sqrt(df/(tcount-1));
00531         }
00532         else {
00533             df = 100;
00534         }
00535         return true;
00536     }
00537     df = 100;
00538     f = 0;
00539     return false;
00540 }
00541 
00542 bool EGS_JCFControl::readControlString() {
00543     /*
00544     MY_ISTREAM data(buf);
00545     if( !egsGetI64(data,ntot) ) return false;
00546     if( !egsGetI64(data,nleft) ) return false;
00547     double f,df;
00548     data >> njob >> tsum >> tsum2 >> tcount >> f >> df >> start_time;
00549     return data.good();
00550     */
00551     double f,df;
00552     int res = sscanf(buf,"%lld %lld %d %lg %lg %lg %lg %lg %ld",
00553                      &ntot,&nleft,&njob,&tsum,&tsum2,&tcount,&f,&df,&start_time);
00554     if (res == EOF || res != 9) {
00555         return false;
00556     }
00557     return true;
00558 }
00559 
00560 int EGS_JCFControl::startSimulation() {
00561     int res = EGS_RunControl::startSimulation();
00562     if (res) {
00563         return res;
00564     }
00565     bool ok = (ipar == 1) ? createControlFile() : openControlFile();
00566     if (ok) {
00567         egsInformation("    Parallel run with %d jobs and %d chunks per "
00568                        "job\n\n\n",npar,nchunk);
00569         return 0;
00570     }
00571     return -99;
00572 }
00573 
00574 bool EGS_JCFControl::readControlFile() {
00575     if (!p->rewindControlFile()) {
00576         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to rewind the job control file\n");
00577         return false;
00578     }
00579     int res = READ_FILE(p->fd,buf,nbuf-1);
00580     if (res <= 0) {
00581         p->unlockControlFile();
00582         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to read the job control file\n");
00583         return false;
00584     }
00585     buf[res] = 0;
00586     if (!readControlString()) {
00587         p->unlockControlFile();
00588         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to read from the control string"
00589                    " <%s>\n",buf);
00590         return false;
00591     }
00592     return true;
00593 }
00594 
00595 bool EGS_JCFControl::writeControlFile() {
00596     if (!writeControlString()) {
00597         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::writeControlFile: failed to write to the "
00598                    "control string\n");
00599         return false;
00600     }
00601     if (!p->rewindControlFile()) {
00602         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to rewind the job control file\n");
00603         return false;
00604     }
00605     int nwant = strlen(buf)+1;
00606     int nwrite = WRITE_FILE(p->fd,buf,nwant);
00607     if (!p->unlockControlFile()) {
00608         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::writeControlFile: failed to unlock the "
00609                    "control file\n");
00610         return false;
00611     }
00612     if (nwrite != nwant) {
00613         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::getNextChunk: could write only %d "
00614                    "instead of %d chars to the job control file?\n",nwrite,nwant);
00615         return false;
00616     }
00617     return true;
00618 }
00619 
00620 EGS_I64 EGS_JCFControl::getNextChunk() {
00621     if (!readControlFile()) {
00622         return -1;
00623     }
00624     if (first_time) {
00625         first_time = false;
00626         njob++;
00627     }
00628     double sum, sum2, count;
00629     app->getCurrentResult(sum,sum2,norm,count);
00630     tsum += sum - last_sum;
00631     tsum2 += sum2 - last_sum2;
00632     tcount += count - last_count;
00633     last_sum = sum;
00634     last_sum2 = sum2;
00635     last_count = count;
00636     EGS_I64 nrun = ncase/(npar*nchunk);
00637     if (nrun < 1) {
00638         nrun = 1;
00639     }
00640     if (nrun > nleft) {
00641         nrun = nleft;
00642     }
00643     if (nrun > 0) {
00644         app->setSimulationChunk(ntot,nrun);
00645     }
00646     nleft -= nrun;
00647     ntot += nrun;
00648     writeControlFile();
00649     double f,df;
00650     if (accu > 0 && getCombinedResult(f,df)) {
00651         if (df < 100 && df < accu) {
00652             char c = '%';
00653             egsWarning("\n\n*** After combining the results of all parallel "
00654                        "jobs the requested\n    uncertainty of %g%c was reached: %g%c\n"
00655                        "    => terminating simulation.\n\n",accu,c,df,c);
00656             return 0;
00657         }
00658     }
00659     return nrun;
00660 }
00661 
00662 int EGS_RunControl::finishSimulation() {
00663     cpu_time = timer.time();
00664     egsInformation("\n\nFinished simulation\n\n");
00665     egsInformation("%-40s%.2f (sec.) %.4f(hours)\n",
00666                    "Total cpu time for this run:",cpu_time,cpu_time/3600);
00667     //egsInformation("Total cpu time for this run: %g seconds (%g hours)\n\n",
00668     //        cpu_time, cpu_time/3600);
00669     if (previous_cpu_time > 0)
00670         egsInformation("%-40s%.2f (sec.) %.4f(hours)\n",
00671                        "CPU time including previous runs:",cpu_time+previous_cpu_time,
00672                        (cpu_time+previous_cpu_time)/3600);
00673     egsInformation("%-40s%-14g\n","Histories per hour:",3600.*ndone/
00674                    (cpu_time+previous_cpu_time));
00675     egsInformation("%-40s%-14lld\n","Number of random numbers used:",
00676                    app->randomNumbersUsed());
00677     double ch_steps, all_steps;
00678     app->getElectronSteps(ch_steps,all_steps);
00679     egsInformation("%-40s%-14g\n","Number of electron CH steps:",
00680                    ch_steps);
00681     //egsInformation("%-40s%14g\n","Number of all electron steps:",
00682     //        all_steps);
00683     egsInformation("%-40s","Number of all electron steps:");
00684     egsInformation("%-14g\n",all_steps);
00685     return 0;
00686 }
00687 
00688 int EGS_JCFControl::finishSimulation() {
00689     int err = EGS_RunControl::finishSimulation();
00690     if (err < 0) {
00691         return err;
00692     }
00693     if (removed_jcf) {
00694         return 0;
00695     }
00696     if (!readControlFile()) {
00697         return -2;
00698     }
00699     njob--;
00700     writeControlFile();
00701     p->closeControlFile();
00702     if (njob > 0 || removed_jcf) {
00703         return 0;
00704     }
00705     string cfile = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),app->getFinalOutputFile());
00706     cfile += ".lock";
00707 #ifdef WIN32
00708     int res = _unlink(cfile.c_str());
00709 #else
00710     int res = unlink(cfile.c_str());
00711 #endif
00712     if (res) egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::finishSimulation: failed to remove "
00713                             " the job control file %s\n",cfile.c_str());
00714     removed_jcf = true;
00715     return 1;
00716 }
00717 
00718 EGS_JCFControl::~EGS_JCFControl() {
00719     delete p;
00720 }

00722 bool EGS_JCFControl::closeControlFile() {
00723     return p->closeControlFile();
00724 }

00726 bool EGS_JCFControl::lockControlFile() {

00728 }
00729 
00730 bool EGS_JCFControl::unlockControlFile() {
00731     return p->unlockControlFile();
00732 }
00733 
00734 bool EGS_JCFControl::rewindControlFile() {
00735     return p->rewindControlFile();
00736 }
00737 
00738 typedef EGS_RunControl *(*EGS_RunControlCreationFunction)(EGS_Application *);
00739 
00740 EGS_RunControl *EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(EGS_Application *a) {
00741     if (!a) {
00742         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(): "
00743                    "null application?\n");
00744         return 0;
00745     }
00746     EGS_Input *inp = a->getInput();
00747     EGS_Input *irc = 0;
00748     if (inp) {
00749         irc = inp->getInputItem("run control");
00750     }
00751     if (!irc) {
00752         /*
00753         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(): "
00754                 "the application does not have any input\n");
00755         return 0;
00756         */
00757         if (a->getNparallel() > 0) {
00758             return new EGS_JCFControl(a);
00759         }
00760         else {
00761             return new EGS_RunControl(a);
00762         }
00763     }
00764     /*
00765     EGS_Input *irc = inp->getInputItem("run control");
00766     if( !irc ) {
00767         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(): "
00768                 "the application input has no 'run control' item\n");
00769         return 0;
00770     }
00771     */
00772     string libname;
00773     int err = irc->getInput("library",libname);
00774     EGS_RunControl *result;
00775     if (!err) {
00776         EGS_Library *lib = 0;
00777         for (unsigned int j=0; j<rc_libs.size(); j++) {
00778             if (libname == rc_libs[j]->libraryName()) {
00779                 lib = rc_libs[j];
00780                 break;
00781             }
00782         }
00783         if (!lib) {
00784             string dsodir = egsJoinPath("egs++","dso");
00785             dsodir = egsJoinPath(dsodir,CONFIG_NAME);
00786             dsodir = egsJoinPath(a->getHenHouse(),dsodir);
00787             lib = new EGS_Library(libname.c_str(),dsodir.c_str());
00788             lib->load();
00789             if (!lib->isLoaded()) {
00790                 egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject: failed to"
00791                            " load the library %s from %s\n",libname.c_str(),
00792                            dsodir.c_str());
00793                 delete irc;
00794                 return 0;
00795             }
00796             rc_libs.push_back(lib);
00797         }
00798         EGS_RunControlCreationFunction create =
00799             (EGS_RunControlCreationFunction) lib->resolve("createRunControl");
00800         if (!create) {
00801             egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject: failed to"
00802                        " resolve the run control creation function of library %s\n",
00803                        libname.c_str());
00804             result = 0;
00805         }
00806         else {
00807             result = create(a);
00808         }
00809     }
00810     else {
00811         if (a->getNparallel() > 0) {
00812             result = new EGS_JCFControl(a);
00813         }
00814         else {
00815             result = new EGS_RunControl(a);
00816         }
00817     }
00818     delete irc;
00819     return result;
00820 }
